title: Windows 7 SP1 5in1 x86 en-US Jun2015 murphy78
description:
murphy78 presents Windows 7 SP1 5in1 x86 en-US Jun2015
Contains Windows Updates current to Jun9-2015 patch date

No Windows 7 Settings were harmed in the making of this ISO.
No Programs are added to Windows.
No Unattended Settings were added to the installation.
No Registry Settings were modified.

32-bit MSDN Sources:
en_windows_7_ultimate_with_sp1_x86_dvd_u_677460.iso
en_windows_7_enterprise_with_sp1_x86_dvd_u_677710.iso

Installation Indexes:
Windows 7 Home Basic
Windows 7 Home Premium
Windows 7 Professional
Windows 7 Ultimate
Windows 7 Enterprise

Release File: Win7SP1_5in1-x86-Jun2015-en-US.iso
Size: 3.60 GB
SHA-1: 4AC0DD05D9CAEDB72C7767B1222D07F5E5F27E9E

Language: en-US (English - United States)

Tools used:
Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 7.0
imagex for image compression, renaming, and export
dism for Windows Updates integration and mounted file copy
oscdimg for ISO mastering
Added Info folder to Setup dir to annoy credit thieves.

Features:
-Internet Explorer 11
-NetFx452 installer and updates in ISO folder for optional installs.
-DaRT7.0 recovery-mode options integrated into boot and winre.
-Some useful scripts in similarly named folder on iso.

Changes:
-Reformed my baseline image and removed some unnecessary updates.
-Stopped including KB971033 since none of the x86 versions request it.

Instructions:
**Determine how you want to activate before installing**:
-Use Microsoft Toolkit KMS activator for Enterprise/Pro
-Use Windows Loader for BIOS-boot MBR-partitioned Home/Pro/Ult
